messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Your maitenence is slowly being lost on our digital map of the station. Investagate maitenence tunnels for the issue, and we will send you one object of your choice.-Centcomm.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. We have sent a few experimental welding tools to cargo. Use with care.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. 5 Experimental welding tools have been bluespace dropped into cargo.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Protect the station. It's worth more than you are.-Centcomm.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. More Grenades have been bluespace dropped at botany. Eliminate the threat completely.-Centcomm

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Several Goats have been bluespace dropped at cargo.-Centcomm

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention staff of space station 13. We will now provide an explaination for the space vines. Your station was selected as a testing ground for weaponized kudzu. Now that you know about this project. You must completely eliminate the bioweapon. Or you will not be able to leave.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Weaponized Kudzu was a huge success. Thank you, space station 13. For being our testing ground for the weapon. You now will be given 3 choices of objects to choose from once the situation has been rectified. Also. You will not be leaving.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Several goats have been Bluespace dropped into EVA Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. We are sending-M-re--KKRRKK- Supplies.-Stand..-By...-Transmission lost.-

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Medical Officer's Office.
